description:
Bindings to suit training days and fitness-focused skiers. The Prolink Access Skate Bindings clip manually to your boots so you can feel when they engage securely. A nice low profile gives you a good feel for the terrain.

  • NNN-compatible Prolink composite guide ridge is low profile so your boots sit close to the ski
  • Ergonomic lever with secure closure and a wide, easy-in, easy-out opening
  • Flexor stiffness rating of 100
name: Salomon Prolink Access Skate Bindings
